import {Form,Button,Row,Col, Container} from 'react-bootstrap'; import {useFormik} from 'formik'; import * as Yup from 'yup' const initialValues={ location: '', destination: '', type: '' } const onSubmit= values =>{ console.log('form data',values) } const validationSchema= Yup.object({ location: Yup.string().required('Required!'), destination: Yup.string().required('Required!'), type: Yup.string().required('Required!') }) const RentalForm = () => { const formik = useFormik({ initialValues, onSubmit, validationSchema }) console.log('Form Values', formik.values) return (
Source Location* {formik.errors.location ?
{formik .errors .location}
: null } Destination* {formik.errors.destination ?
{formik .errors .destination}
: null } Enter Car type* {formik.errors.type ?
{formik .errors .type}
: null } Number of Travellers
) } export default RentalForm
